channel.title: Frameworks on Product Manager Playbook
channel.description: Recent content in Frameworks on Product Manager Playbook

item.title: Decision-Making Framework
item.description: Frameworks to support structured and transparent decision-making in product management, helping teams evaluate options, trade-offs, and risks.

item.title: Discovery Framework
item.description: Frameworks that guide product discovery activities, from understanding user problems to validating assumptions and shaping solutions.

item.title: Prioritization Framework
item.description: Frameworks to help Product Managers prioritize initiatives, features, and opportunities based on impact, effort, risk, and strategic alignment.

item.title: Problem Framing Framework
item.description: Frameworks for clearly defining, framing, and communicating product problems before jumping to solutions.

item.title: Product Strategy Framework
item.description: Frameworks that support long-term product strategy, aligning vision, goals, customer value, and business outcomes.
